hero.title: Level Up Your Future ‚Äî Study in Japan

intro.subheading: Leading students to a bright future in JAPAN.
intro.paragraph1: Momiji International Academy warmly welcomes you to a place where dreams take flight and futures are shaped. As an institution committed to guiding students on their journey to Japan, we provide expert support in education, language training, cultural adaptation, and career development.
intro.paragraph2: Our mission is simple ‚Äî to open doors for Nepali students and job seekers who aspire to build a better future in Japan. Whether you're interested in nursing care, food service, civil engineering, or academic studies, we are here to walk beside you every step of the way. At Momiji, we believe that education is more than just books ‚Äî it is preparation for life. That‚Äôs why we offer both online and offline support, real-time counseling, job interview preparation, and language courses designed to help you succeed in Japan's competitive and dynamic environment. We understand that moving abroad is a big step. That‚Äôs why we are not just a consultancy ‚Äî we are a family. A family that listens, guides, and stands by you from the first inquiry to your successful settlement in Japan. Thousands of students have already taken the step forward with Momiji.
intro.ending1: Now, it‚Äôs your turn. Join us. Let‚Äôs build your future together.
intro.ending2: Your journey to Japan begins at Momiji.

why.heading: Why Choose Momiji?
why.subheading1: At Momiji, our greatest strength lies in delivering accurate, up-to-date guidance on Japanese institutions, entry requirements, and cultural adaptation. Backed by an experienced and passionate team, we ensure a smooth and efficient process that saves you time and empowers you with confidence.
why.subheading2: But beyond expertise, we treat your dream as our own. Choosing us means gaining not just a consultancy‚Äîbut a dedicated partner genuinely committed to shaping your future in Japan.

items.title: High Visa Success Rate
items.description: Our experienced counselors provide tailored advice on university selection, course alignment, and visa procedures to help you achieve your study-abroad goals.

items.title: Certified & Experienced Counselors
items.description: We assist with all aspects of the admission process‚Äîshortlisting institutions, preparing SOPs and LoRs, completing applications, and preparing for interviews.

items.title: Transparent Workflow System
items.description: Our experts help identify and apply for relevant scholarships and assistantships, increasing your chances of receiving funding or tuition waivers.

items.title: Partnership With Japanese Universities
items.description: We provide complete support with visa applications, document checklists, mock interviews, and embassy guidelines‚Äîso you can proceed confidently.

items.title: Personalized Counselling Approach
items.description: From accommodation search to orientation on culture, travel, and budgeting, our pre-departure and post-arrival guidance ensures a smooth transition.

items.title: Pre & Post Departure Support
items.content: Helping You Settle Abroad with Confidence
items.description: From accommodation search to orientation on culture, travel, and budgeting, our pre-departure and post-arrival guidance ensures a smooth transition.

sections.title: Free 1-on-1 Counseling ‚Äî Let‚Äôs Talk!
sections.content: We start by truly getting to know you ‚Äî your goals, your dreams, and what you‚Äôre passionate about. Whether you‚Äôre still confused about which university to choose or what course is best for your future, we‚Äôll help you figure it out.
sections.conv: We‚Äôre committed to making your journey stress-free right from day one.

sections.title: University & Course Selection in Japan ‚Äî Personalized Guidance
sections.content: Japan has a wide range of top universities and language schools, each with its own strengths. Based on your interests, budget, and long-term goals, we‚Äôll help you choose the best-fit institution and course ‚Äî whether it‚Äôs a language program, vocational course, or full degree.
sections.conv: We recommend what‚Äôs best for you ‚Äî not just what‚Äôs popular.

sections.title: Document Preparation ‚Äî No Confusion, No Mistakes
sections.content: We‚Äôll guide you through every document you need ‚Äî from your SOP (Statement of Purpose) to recommendation letters, CV, and more. Plus, we‚Äôll review and polish them so you make a strong impression.
sections.conv: No more guessing what to write ‚Äî we‚Äôll help you present your story perfectly.

sections.title: Fast & Smooth Application Process
sections.content: Once your documents are ready, we handle the entire application process ‚Äî making sure everything is submitted correctly and on time. You‚Äôll be informed at every step.
sections.conv: Your application is handled with precision and professionalism ‚Äî no delays, no confusion.

sections.title: Interview & Test Guidance
sections.content: Need to take NAT, JLPT, or prepare for your student visa interview? Don‚Äôt worry ‚Äî we offer mock tests, expert coaching, and personalized practice sessions to ensure you are fully prepared.
sections.conv: We help you boost your confidence, not just your scores.

sections.title: Visa Filing to Departure ‚Äî Full Support
sections.content: We handle your visa application, double-check everything, and guide you until it‚Äôs approved. Once you‚Äôre ready to go, we‚Äôll help you with ticketing, accommodation, and even pre-departure orientation.
sections.conv: Yes, we‚Äôll still be with you even after you land.

motto.subheading: At our consultancy, we provide end-to-end support to students aspiring to pursue higher education in Japan. Whether in-person or virtually (on request), our dedicated team assists you throughout the entire journey‚Äîfrom university selection to post-arrival settlement.
motto.servicehead: We Will Be There With You At Your Each Step

criteria.heading: Eligibility criteria
criteria.subheading: Meet these essential requirements to be eligible for scholarship programs

list.title: Academic Excellence
list.description: Applicants must have a strong academic record and consistently high grades throughout their previous education.

list.title: Language Proficiency
list.description: Demonstrated Japanese or English proficiency (JLPT, IELTS, or TOEFL) depending on the program requirements.

list.title: Study Plan or Statement of Purpose
list.description: A well-written study plan that clearly states your goals, motivations, and academic interests.

list.title: Good Conduct
list.description: Applicants must have a clean disciplinary record and show respect for cultural and institutional values.

list.title: Age Requirement
list.description: Most institutions have a minimum age requirement, often 18 years or older at the time of enrollment.

apply.heading: How To Apply
apply.subheading: Follow our simple steps to begin your journey to study in Japan with Scholarship opportunities.

list.description: Applicants must have a clean disciplinary record and show respect for cultural and institutional values.
